text:
......Asahi, the trash is piling up,
so let's tidy──...
(Now they've started reading a different book...?)

Asahi, it's fine to read,
but when you take things out of your bag...

My bag...
Oh yeah, in this pocket here...!

I've got a whistle I bought at the candy store!
Producer-san, want to give it a blow too!?
Yeah... but first, let's tidy up...!
